summary:
Peter van Doren is a senior development cooperation expert with extensive experience (20 years) in managing development and rehabilitation programmes in 13 African countries and in Albania.
He also worked several years as Adviser for local government and civil society involvement in decentralisation and good governance processes.
He has worked for NGOs and Consultancy firms in programmes funded by Netherlands government, ECHO, EC, UNDP, UNHCR, WFP, Unicef and international NGOs.

Specialties: 
Interim Management
Rural development
Decentralisation and Local Governance
Rehabilitation
